body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IFRS 3, is contained in Part A of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 July 2009. The text of the Accompanying Guidance on IFRS 3 is contained in Part B of this edition. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
BASIS FOR CONCLUSIONS
APPENDIX TO THE BASIS FOR CONCLUSIONSAmendments to the Basis for Conclusions on other IFRSs
